description:
Gitconvex - A web UI client for git. 

      Gitconvex was initially conceived to be a git UI client for Linux servers, where we do not get the luxury of using a native GUI client. After using tools like Kibana, I realized that a web application is capable of performing wonders when it is coupled with a robust backend. The app was developed with React JS + Golang to provide a seamless user experience.
summary: Gitconvex is a web based GUI client for managing git repositories on the go
author: neel1996, aravinve, Nageswari-droid
